mapper.select:
SELECT i.qr_code, i.file_name, i.image_url, COALESCE(v.count, 0) AS count FROM image i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM vote GROUP BY file_name ) v ON i.file_name = v.file_name ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 10
